Source code for xtreme1.exceptions

[docs]class SDKException(Exception):
    code = None

    def __init__(self, message='', code=None):
        if code:
            self.code = code
        super().__init__(f'<{self.code}> {message}')




[docs]class UrlNotFoundException(SDKException):
    code = 404




[docs]class ParamException(SDKException):
    code = 'PARAM_ERROR'




[docs]class DatasetIdException(SDKException):
    code = 'DATASET_NOT_FOUND'




[docs]class ConverterException(SDKException):
    """

    """



EXCEPTIONS = {
    ParamException.code: ParamException,
    DatasetIdException.code: DatasetIdException
}
